DOC.brief_summary: Regular breakfast consumption may help low body weight reduce body fatness improve cardiovascular disease risk factor . However , best kind breakfast consume achieve effect unclear . We hypothesize high fiber breakfast would suppress appetite , low body weight improve cardiovascular disease risk factor compare no-fiber breakfast .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Different Fiber Breakfasts Appetite Weight Change Overweight Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Participants report hospital cafeteria 0800 0900h follow overnight fast every weekday 4 consecutive week . On arrival , participant provide allocated breakfast give 15 min consume food provide . The oatmeal breakfast consist 80g dry oatmeal ( Quaker Quick Oats ) prepare 120mL fat-free milk 230mL water . The frosted flake breakfast consist 62g frost flake 160mL whole milk 190mL water serve side . The No-breakfast ( control ) consist 350mL plain water . All participant also receive 200mL decaffeinated coffee 12mL non-dairy creamer 1g packet non-caloric sweetener . On Friday week participant provide two portion breakfast take home consume weekend day . On first day intervention weekly thereafter participant complete 3hr subjective appetite rating response breakfast . Laboratory assessment include body weight , composition , blood pressure fast blood sample collect start intervention end intervention .
DOC.criteria: BMI > 27kg/m2 Weight stable ( < 5 % weight change past 3 month ) Smokers Regular use medication Currently undertake weightloss exercise program Females pregnant lactate
